title: I can't find the practice tool
body:
I just got the 7.3 update downloaded and I knew that the practice tool came out with the update (I checked the patch notes to make sure). However, I can't seem to find it. I'm using the new client and have checked the legacy client and it's in neither place. I'm in EUW too.

This is probably down to me being dumb but I can't find it

replies.body: The practice tool isn't available just yet.  Per the [patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-73-notes#patch-lcu), it's aimed to be available for testing but not right away.  Hang tight until ti's enabled!
Thanks for the fast response! Have you any idea when it might be available to EUW (other than Soon™)?

Sorry, I really don't have any details or news on that.  You may want to bookmark the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards for announcements and discussions with testers on the updated client.  Thanks for helping out!
Do you know which regions are first since its said ''region by region''
The first regions are LAN/ LAS/BR/OCE, but if you don't have an account on the server, don't bother making a new one, you have to be at least lvl 10 to play it
do you know approximately when it will come to NA?
When will this be released on the legacy client? After 7.4?

Never, it's only on the updated client ffs....
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
So I can't find the practice tool either, and I think I am on the old client. How do I update my client? Also, on a Mac so I am not sure if that changes anything.
